doc:
Sally Geeson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sally_Geeson 0 Sally Louise Geeson (born 23 June 1950 in Cuckfield, West Sussex, England) is an English actress with a career mostly on television in the 1970s. Her best known role was as Sid James's daughter, Sally, in Bless This House. Her character was only 16 at the start despite the fact Geeson herself was in her early 20s.Geeson studied at Corona Stage Academy from 1957 to 1966, during which time she played small parts in several movies, including The Millionairess (1960), Expresso Bongo (1959), and Carry On Regardless (1961). She also appeared in Carry On Abroad (1972) and Carry On Girls (1973). She also starred alongside Norman Wisdom in the film What's Good for the Goose (1969), and appeared with Vincent Price in two horror films, The Oblong Box (1969) and Cry of the Banshee (1970). In August 2013 Geeson featured in a TV commercial for Anglian Windows. Geeson was the second wife of television personality William G. Stewart. She later took up a career in teaching. She has three children called Barney, Hayley and Christopher. Her sister, the actress Judy Geeson, lives in Hollywood. In December 2014 until January 2015, Geeson played the Good Fairy at Theatre Royal Windsor in their panto Beauty And The Beast. Sally_Louise_Geeson ( born 23_June_1950 in Cuckfield , West_Sussex , England ) is an_English_actress with a_career mostly on television in the_1970s . Her_best_known_role was as Sid_James 's_daughter , Sally , in Bless_This_House . Her_character was only_16 at the_start despite the_fact Geeson herself was in her_early_20s . Geeson studied at Corona_Stage_Academy from 1957 to 1966 , during which time she played small_parts in several_movies , including The_Millionairess_(_1960_) , Expresso_Bongo_(_1959_) , and Carry On Regardless_(_1961_) . She also appeared in Carry On Abroad_(_1972_) and Carry On Girls_(_1973_) . She also starred alongside Norman_Wisdom in the_film What 's Good for the_Goose_(_1969_) , and appeared with Vincent_Price in two_horror_films , The_Oblong_Box_(_1969_)_and_Cry of the_Banshee_(_1970_) . In August_2013_Geeson featured in a_TV_commercial for Anglian_Windows . Geeson was the_second_wife of television_personality_William_G._Stewart . She later took up a_career in teaching . She has three_children called Barney_,_Hayley_and_Christopher . Her_sister , the_actress_Judy_Geeson , lives in Hollywood . In December_2014 until January_2015 , Geeson played the_Good_Fairy at Theatre_Royal_Windsor in their_panto_Beauty And The_Beast .
